recipes.title: Cinnamon Berry Cider
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large saucepan, combine all ingredients. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. Discard cinnamon sticks. Ladle into mugs.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Cinnamon Berry Cider in  Simple & DeliciousFebruary/March 2011, p12                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 cup equals 106 calories, trace fat (trace saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 12 mg sodium, 26 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, trace protein. Diabetic Exchange: 1-1/2 fruit.
